KDnuggets Home » News » 2018 » May » Webcasts & Webinars » Customer-Driven Product Development for the Future, June 6 webinar ( 18:n21 )

Customer-Driven Product Development for the Future, June 6 webinar

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Customer Analytics, Insurance, Insurance Nexus, Risk Analytics

Learn about the tools and strategies you need to develop products to meet the future needs of your customer and thrive in the future of insurance.


Risk is changing as new technologies, trends and available data transform the definition of insurance, so the need for product development has never been more important, and striking the balance between value for customers and carriers will be paramount.

Join Insurance Nexus as they talk to Shannon Lewandowski, Innovation and Digital Team - Head of IoT, American Modern Insurance Group and Kevin Wondra, Head of Innovation at Society Insurance - about the tools and strategies you need to develop products to meet the future needs of your customer and thrive in the future of insurance.

Join the webinar: Balancing Risk: Defining Value in Product Development Innovation for Customer and Carrier (June 6th, 10am CT).

Register for this free webinar for strategies to achieve rapid and customer-driven product development to meet customer expectations, including:
  • Defining the motivation behind changing or developing new insurance products to target innovation, from increased customer engagement, behaviour modification and data collection to reduced risk
  • Improving customer adoption through providing enough incentive to achieve scale, including providing real-time information, lifestyle discounting, device uptake, emergency support and additional services
  • In a sea of connected technologies, high customer expectations & increasing competition where should you focus to create world beating products? Exploring how insurance could change in the future, such as emerging risks, the shareable economy and flexible policies
Register for this webinar and join us on June 6th at 10am CST.

(FYI - if you can't join live, I'll send you the recordings if you register).


Kind regards,
Emma

Emma Sheard
Head of Strategy
Insurance Nexus
Phone: +44 (0) 207 422 4349
Email: emma.sheard@insurancenexus.com

Insurance Nexus is part of FC Business Intelligence Ltd. FC Business Intelligence Ltd is a registered company in England and Wales. Registered number 04388971, 7-9 Fashion Street, London, E1 6PX, UK

Insurance Nexus is the central hub for insurance executives. Through in-depth industry analysis, targeted research, niche events and quality content, we provide the industry with a platform to network, discuss, learn and shape the future of the insurance industry.
